description: This file is a C header file (.h) defining exported API function prototypes for the BMC2 component within the Broadway Management Console. It includes function declarations related to creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the 'Com Domain' object, commonly used in C projects for interface declarations.

methods.name: Bmc2CreateComDomain
methods.description: Creates a new instance of the Bmc2 Com Domain object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: Bmc2ComdoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Bmc2 Com Domain object with specified context and reserved handles.

methods.name: Bmc2ComdoRemove
methods.description: Removes an existing Bmc2 Com Domain object instance.

methods.name: Bmc2ComdoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Bmc2 Com Domain object, typically used for setup.

methods.name: Bmc2ComdoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Bmc2 Com Domain object instance.
